484.「はあ………。また ニコロイ王が\n 捨てられた城へ 行ってしまわれた。:
(sigh)... King Nikoroi has gone to the
abandoned castle yet again...

485.「５０年前に あの城で\n ご家族に何があったのか 知りたいという\n お気持ち:
I understand that you want to know what
happened to your family fifty years ago,
but...

486.「どこにも 残されておらぬ記録。\n クチにすれば 災いを呼ぶと言われる\n 白:
There's nothing left of her... The name of
the White Princess is said to bring bad
luck...

487.「触れてはならぬ 忌まわしい過去が\n 隠されているとしか 思えぬ。:
I assume there is a cursed part of your past
that must not be touched hidden deep
within.

489.「学びの庭を かつてない成績で卒業した\n この奇跡の秀才 キュウスケを\n お:
You called for me, the miraculous genius
Kyusuke, graduate of the Garden of
Learning with unprecedented results?

491.「じつは また ニコロイ王が\n 捨てられた城へ 行ってしまわれてな……。\n:
Actually, King Nikoroi has left for the
abandoned castle again... I hate to ask,
but can you go and check on him?

494.「む……？\n そなた いつから そこにおった。:
Hmm...? How long have you been standing
there?

495.「……なるほど。そなたは\n キーエンブレムを求めて はるばる\n この王都へ:
I see... So you've come all the way here for
a Key Emblem.

496.「残念だが ニコロイ王は ご不在だ。\n 近頃 王は 捨てられた城と呼ばれる\n:
I regret to inform you that the king is not here. Lately, he's been obsessed with the former Kamiharmui castle, which was
abandoned quite a long time ago.

497.「……まあ 一人前の証を持つ者になら\n そのわけを話しても かまわんだろう。:
Well, you DO have a Mark of Maturity, so I
suppose I can tell you the whole story.

498.「５０年前……まだ幼かった ニコロイ様を残して\n 王族たちが そろって 不穏な:
Fifty years ago... A bizarre incident occurred in which the whole royal family died a disturbing death, leaving behind a young
Nikoroi.

499.「それと 時を同じくして\n 城に隠された 聖地がチカラを失い………\n 城は:
At the same time, the sanctuary hidden
within the castle lost its power, and the
castle fell into decay.

500.「王家の呪い……。民は そう恐れ\n それまでの カミハルムイ城を捨てて\n こ:
It was a royal curse... The people were so
afraid that they abandoned the old castle
and moved the city here.

501.「５０年前に いったい 何が起きたのか。\n それは 今でも わかっておらん。:
Just what happened fifty years ago?
I've no idea...

502.「ニコロイ王は まだ幼子であったし\n 当時を知るはずの 年寄りたちは\n クチ:
King Nikoroi was just a boy back then, and the
elderly folks who were alive back then won't
say a word.

504.「ニコロイ王は 北の 捨てられた城へ\n 出向いておられる。すまぬが そなたも\:
King Nikoroi is on his way north to the
abandoned castle. Sorry, but could you
go after him for me?

505.「捨てられた城は 北門を抜けた先の\n 夢幻の森の 奥地にある。\n くわしい話:
If you take the north gate and keep heading north, you'll reach the Dream Forest. The abandoned castle is deep within. If you
want to know more, folks in the castle can tell you.

513.「恐れるほどのものでもない……。: It's nothing to be afraid of...

517.「うん カク！\n 姉上は 山ブドウが 大好きだから。\n これなら……:
Yeah, Kaku! My sister loves these.
When she sees them, she's gonna...

518.「きっと よろこんでくれるよね！:
...she's gonna be really happy! I just know
it!

519.「そうですね。\n 明日は ナシュロイ王様の お誕生日……。:
Is that right? Well, tomorrow is King
Nashuroi's birthday...

520.「リタ姫様にも 元気になっていただいて\n 一緒に お祝いしたいですものね。:
I really hope Princess Rita will be all better
so we can celebrate it together...

524.「リタが…… リタが 乱心した！！: It's Rita... Rita's lost her mind!!

534.「<pc>さん！\n ……いや もう あの頃のオレじゃねえ。:
Look, it's <pc>!
Wait, can't let them see me like this...

535.「<pc>！\n とんでもねえもんを 見ちまったな！:
Hey, <pc>!
Did you see that just now?!

536.「おっ あんた！\n たしか 玉座の間で会ったよな！？:
Oh, it's you! Didn't we meet in the throne
room just a little while ago?

537.「……そうか <pc>っていうのか。\n とんでもねえもんを 見ちまったな！:
Got it, so your name's <pc>...
Did you see all that just now?

538.「こんな所に来たってことは\n お前も コトル大臣から\n 王のことを 頼まれて:
If you've come all this way, then that means
Kotoru asked you to come find the king,
right?

539.「とにかく 今は これ以上進まずに\n 一度 カミハルムイ城に戻ろう！:
Anyhow, we shouldn't go any further. Let's
go back to the castle!

541.「ニコロイ王！！\n もう 捨てられた城へ行くのは\n おやめください！:
King Nikoroi!
You musn't go to the abandoned castle any
longer!

542.「キュウスケがいたから よかったものの\n あのような危険な場所で 気を失うとは:
It's a good thing Kyusuke was there! That is
no place you should be fainting!!

543.「そう ガミガミ言うな コトル。\n 危険を冒しただけの価値は あったのだから。:
Yes, yes. There's no need to nag, Kotoru.
It was worth taking the risk.

546.「カミハルムイ王家には 白き者と呼ばれる\n 不思議な子供が 生まれてくることが:
In Kamiharmui's royal family, mysterious
children are sometimes born. They are known
as "the White Ones".

547.「白い髪に 白い肌…… まこと清い姿を持つ\n その子供は 大いなるチカラを持つ:
They have white hair and white skin... These children of immense purity have the ability to connect with the incredible power of
Eltona's Sanctuary.

548.「わしの姉上 リタ姫は\n そういう 特別な子供だったのだよ。:
Rita, my sister, was one of these
special children.

549.「だが 姉上は 乱心の末\n じつの両親……… わしの父と母を殺めた。:
But one day, in a fit of madness...she ended
up killing both of our parents.

552.「あのような恐ろしいことがあったのに\n それを忘れて のうのうと暮らしていた\:
The fact that I've lived a normal life while
forgetting this horrible tragedy... I am
utterly ashamed of myself.

555.「あの時…… 母上は いまわの際に \n 暗黒大樹の葉を 求めていた？\n あれ:
Back then, right before Mother died, she asked
for a leaf from the Dark Tree...? What could
she have meant by that?

564.「チカラなき者を いたずらに\n 危険な目に あわせるのは\n ニコロイ王も 本:
I don't think the king here means to endanger
those who aren't strong on purpose.

566.「おお そなたが <pc>か！\n そなたには 捨てられた城で\n 助けられたそ:
Oh, so you're <pc>!
I heard that you were the one who saved me
at the abandoned castle. Hmm...

567.「では キュウスケ！ <pc>！\n すまぬが そなたたちに頼もう。\n それな:
Very good. I apologize, but I must count
on you both. Your help is much more
reassuring.

569.「……と いうわけだ。別に かまわないだろ？\n オレたちなら 呪われた大地だっ:
...and there you have it. It's no problem,
right? We'll handle that Cursed Land like
it's nothing! Right?

570.「まずは ここから 北西のほうにある\n ガケっぷちの村で 落ちあおう。\n そ:
First, we should regroup at Precipice Village
to the northwest. See you there!

572.「お前のために このキュウスケさんが\n 下調べしておいてやったぜ。:
Your good buddy Kyusuke here's already done
all the research for you.

573.「見えるだろ？\n あの どでかい木が ウワサの暗黒大樹だ。:
See that there? That massive tree is the
infamous Dark Tree.

574.「朽ち木同然で 葉っぱなんて\n ちっとも残ってねえんだが なんでも\n １本だ:
Looks like nothing but just rotting wood,
doesn't it? Well, rumor has it that there's a
branch with a single leaf left.

575.「それじゃあ 頼んだぞ <pc>！\n オレは ニコロイ王を\n カミハルムイに:
So this is where you come in! I'm feeling
pretty beat, so I'm gonna head back to
Kamiharmui now.

576.「こっから先は よろしく！！: It's all up to you now!

583.<cs_pchero>は\n暗黒大樹の葉（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me:
<cs_pchero> received
a Dark Tree Leaf (Key Item)!<me 60>

584.「おかえり <pc>！\n さすがだなっ！:
<pc>, welcome back!
I knew you could do it!

585.「おかえり <pc>！\n お前 なかなか やるなっ！:
Welcome back, <pc>.
Great work out there!

586.「……なんだよ そう にらむなって。\n 暗黒大樹の葉を 手に入れたんだろ？\n:
Why the long face...? You got the leaf from
the Dark Tree, right? Come on, let's go
give to it King Nikoroi!

590.「さあ <pc>。\n 暗黒大樹の葉を ニコロイ王に。:
Go on, <pc>.
Give him the leaf.

591.「なんという 不穏な気……。\n これが 暗黒大樹の葉か。:
What an unsettling aura...
So this is a leaf from the Dark Tree...

592.「<pc> キュウスケ。\n そなたたちの はたらき まことに感謝する！\n ほ:
I am truly grateful for both of your efforts.
Minister Kotoru here will reward you.

593.「わしは 捨てられた城の御殿にある\n 玉座の間へ この葉を納めにいくとしよう。:
I'm going to take this leaf to the throne
room of the abandoned castle.

594.「魔瘴の満ちる 呪われた大地より\n 暗黒大樹の葉を 持ち帰るとは\n まこと:
To bring back a leaf of the Dark Tree from
that miasma-ridden land truly is impressive!

597.「<pc>。そして キュウスケ。\n すまぬが 引き続き ニコロイ王のこと\n:
I hate to ask the both of you again, but can
you continue to keep an eye on King
Nikoroi for me?

598.「どうか そなたたちも ニコロイ王を追って\n 捨てられた城の 御殿にある\n:
Please follow him to the throne room inside
of the abandoned castle.

599.「わかりました コトル大臣。\n このキュウスケと <pc>\n 命に代えても:
Yes, Minister. <pc> and I will
protect the king's life, even if it costs
us our own!

602.「それにしても 暗黒大樹の葉とは……。\n なぜ アグシュナ王妃は 死の間際に\:
But a leaf from the Dark Tree...
Why would Queen Agushuna ask for something
like that as she was dying?

608.「捨てられた城の 御殿にある\n 玉座の間へ 暗黒大樹の葉を納めにいった\n ニ:
King Nikoroi went to the throne room of the
abandoned castle to deliver the leaf of the
Dark Tree... Please keep him safe!

611.「この暗黒大樹の葉のせいだろうか。\n 心なしか まわりの空気が\n 反応してい:
I'm not sure, but it might have to do with
this leaf... It feels if as the surrounding
atmosphere is reacting to it...

613.「ナシュロイ王様ー！\n リタ姫様ー！ ニコロイ王子様ー！: King Nashuroi! Princess Rita! Prince Nikoroi!

617.「ただいま ニコロイ。\n さみしかったでしょう……。ごめんなさいね。:
That's right, Nikoroi. You must have missed
me so much... I'm so sorry.

618.「ううん。\n 母上の病気を 治すためだもん。\n ボク ガマンできたよ！:
Uh uh. I stayed strong because you were gonna
get all better!

619.「でも よかった！\n 来月の お父さまの誕生日に 間に合って。\n 一緒に お:
I'm so glad! Just in time for Father's
birthday... We can all celebrate together!

624.「だいじょうぶ？\n まだ病気…… 治ってないの？:
Are you okay? You're...not still sick, are
you?

627.「大丈夫ですか？\n ずっと おかげんが悪いようですが……。:
Are you all right? You've looked unwell for
some time now...

630.「アグシュナよ。\n そのように走ると また身体に障るぞ。:
Agushuna! If you run like that, you'll hurt
yourself again.

631.「大丈夫ですわ あなた。\n もう 全然 苦しくないのです。:
I'm fine, dear. The pain has completely
passed.

633.「母上 すっごく元気になったね！: Mother's looking so much better, isn't she?!

634.「ボクね 母上が元気になったのは\n 神さまから 父上への ちょっぴり早い\n:
I think Mother getting well was a little
early birthday present to Father from
high above!

637.「これ…… 一緒に食べよう？\n 母上が ボクたちのために……:
Here, do you want some cake?
Mother made it just for us...

641.「母上の体調が 回復してゆくにつれて\n 姉上は 母上を憎むようになっていき……:
As Mother's condition continued to improve,
she grew to hate her...

642.「そして あの日の悲劇に つながったのだ。:
Eventually leading to the tragedy on that
day...

643.「リタ姫様は どうして アグシュナ様を\n 憎んだのでしょう……？: Why did Princess Rita hate Queen Agushuna...?

644.「わからぬ……。\n 母上の回復を願う気持ちは\n 姉上も 同じだと思っていたの:
I do not know...
I thought that she wanted Mother to get
well just as much as we did, but...

645.「この暗黒大樹の葉を納めれば\n 何かが わかるのだろうか……。:
I wonder if the Dark Tree's leaf will reveal
anything to me...

647.「……む？\n 何か言ったか キュウスケ？: Hmm? Did you say something, Kyusuke?

649.「おお。<pc>も 来てくれたか。\n そなたも 共に見届けてくれるなら心強い。:
Oh, I see you've come here too. It's
reassuring to have you here to witness this.

650.「……今は亡き 母上よ。\n 長く お待たせしたこと お許しください。:
To Mother, who is no longer with us...
Please forgive me for keeping you waiting
for so long.

651.「母上の ご遺志の通り 暗黒大樹の葉を\n この玉座の間に 納めさせていただきま:
I will now fulfill your final wish by placing
the leaf of the Dark Tree here inside this
throne room.

655.「まさか…… ああ まさか！！: Can it be...? Oh, it is...!!

656.「ああっ ニコロイ！？\n かすかだが 面影がある……。\n あの小さなニコロイ:
Is that you, Nikoroi?! I can see the faint
resemblance... My little Nikoroi, all
grown up...

658.「見間違えようもない……。\n あの日のままの 母上よ。\n こうして ふたたび:
There's no mistaking it... You look just as
you were on that day. I never thought I'd
ever see you again...!

659.「どうやら 苦労をかけたようですね。\n でも ニコロイ。\n あなただけでも:
I can tell that you've been through much.
But, Nikoroi... I'm just glad that you are
safe.

661.「ここにいるのは キュウスケと <pc>。\n 我が助けとなってくれている 旅人:
Here with me are Kyusuke and <pc>.
They are both travelers who have helped
me.

662.「この者たちが 暗黒大樹の葉を\n 手に入れてきてくれたのです。:
They were the ones who brought me the
leaf of the Dark Tree.

663.「おお…… そうだったのですか。\n おかげで 長き眠りから 目覚めることが\n:
Oh... Is that so?
Thanks to you, I've woken up from a long
sleep... How can I express my gratitude?

665.「教えてください！\n ５０年前の あの日 この城で\n 何が 起こったのかを！:
Please! You must tell me what happened in
this castle on that day fifty years ago!

666.「ニコロイ……。\n あなたは 姉のリタが 大好きでしたね。\n 真実は 知らな:
Nikoroi... I know that you love your sister
Rita very much. Perhaps it's better that you
didn't know the truth...

667.「私は もう幼い子供ではありません。\n どうか 真実を お伝えください。:
I am no longer a young child.
Please tell me what happened.

669.「ニコロイ。リタが 聖地と通じ合える\n 特別なチカラを持つ子供……\n 白き者:
You remember that Rita was one of the White
Ones able to communicate with the Sanctuary,
don't you?

670.「リタは 聖地と通じ合えるチカラを利用し\n 聖地の大いなるチカラを\n 我が物:
She wanted to use that ability to take the
Sanctuary's power for herself.

671.「あの子が なぜ そんなことを企んだのかは\n わかりません。ナシュロイ王と 私:
I don't know what would drive that child to
do such a thing. By the time Nashuroi and I
figured it out, it was too late...

672.「身に余る聖地のチカラを取り込んだ リタは\n 心を失い 暴走しました。ナシュロ:
The power she took in was more than she could
handle, and she went mad. Nashuroi tried
stopping her, but she killed him...

674.「ニコロイ。\n 私たちは 王家の一族として 聖地を守るという\n 使命を 果た:
Nikoroi. As a member of the royal family, you
must fulfill our mission to protect the
Sanctuary of this land.

675.「聖地は…… この大地の チカラの源。\n エルトナ大陸の心臓なのです。:
The Sanctuary is...the source of this land's
power. It is the heart of Eltona itself.

676.「リタに チカラを奪われた聖地が\n 今 どうなっているのか……。\n 急ぎ 確:
We must see what happened to the Sanctuary
after Rita had stripped its power...
We have to find out!

677.「母上が持っていた 黄金の指輪ならば \n あの日以来 肌身離さず 持っておりま:
If you mean the golden ring you once held,
I've been keeping it with me ever since that
day. We must hurry to the royal garden.

678.「<pc>。キュウスケ。\n そなたたちも 共に 王家の庭へ来てくれ。:
Both of you, please come with me to the royal
garden.

679.「まずは 城壁の外へ出てくれ。\n そして 北の住居跡を抜け 立て札を頼りに \:
First, go outside the castle walls. Then, pass
through the ruins to the north, following the
signs to the garden in the back.

680.「母上。すこし よろしいでしょうか？\n じつは 姉上が チカラを求めた理由……:
Mother, do you have a moment?
I think I may have a theory about why Rita
wanted that power...

681.「いや～ びっくりだよなあ。: Well if this isn't a big surprise.

682.「まさか 死んだと思われていた王妃が \n こんな形で 現れるなんてねえ。:
That queen that everyone thought was dead...
Never expected her to just appear out of
nowhere like that.

684.「それじゃあ 行くとしようぜ！\n ええと 城壁を出てから 北の住居跡を抜け\n:
Well, we should get moving! Once we're outside
the castle walls, let's make our way through
the ruins to the garden in the back!

701.「……今なら 思いだすことができる。\n この王家の庭は 姉上が好んだ場所であっ:
I... I remember now... This royal garden
was my sister's favorite place. We used to
play here together as children...

702.「あの子が なぜ 聖地のチカラを\n 我が物としようとしたのか\n ずっと わか:
It's always puzzled me as to why that child
wanted the Sanctuary's power all to
herself...

703.「ニコロイより リタの部屋にあった日記を\n 見せてもらって ようやく 得心が行:
When you showed me the diary that was in
Rita's room, I finally understood.

704.「あの子が聖地のチカラを求めたのは……\n 私の病を 治すためだったのですね……:
The reason she sought the power of the
Sanctuary... It was to cure my illness...

705.「なんということでしょう。\n かわいそうな リタ……。:
How terrible that is...
That poor, poor Rita...

707.「いいえ 大丈夫です……。\n それより 今は 王家の使命を果たさねば。:
Don't worry, I'm okay... I'm more concerned
about fulfilling our royal duty.

714.「では <cs_pchero>よ。\n これより 聖地へと入るとしよう。:
Come, <cs_pchero>. Let us enter the
Sanctuary.

715.「さあ ニコロイ。\n 黄金の指輪を 泉に投げ入れなさい。\n 聖地への扉を 開:
Nikoroi. Please cast the golden ring into the
fountain. That will open the way to the
Sanctuary.

718.「なんと美しい所だ……。\n これで 聖なるチカラが 失われているとは\n とて:
What a beautiful place...
It's hard to believe that it's losing its
sacred power...

719.「あの ひときわ大きな 白い木は……？\n もしや 聖地への入り口を ふさいでい:
That large white tree over there... Is it
blocking the way to the Sanctuary?

720.「母上 いったい あの木は……: Mother, just what is that tree...?

723.「くっくっくっ……\n かわいそうな ニコロイ坊や！: Heh heh heh... Poor little Nikoroi!

724.「だまされやすいのは 父親ゆずりなのかねえ？:
Is being so easily fooled something from your
father's side, I wonder?

726.「この５０年…… なんと 長かったことだろう！\n あの 小生意気な リタのおか:
Fifty years... How long it's been! It's taken
a long time, thanks to that cheeky little
Rita, but...

727.「今こそ エルトナ大陸は 私の物になるのだ！: Now the land of Eltona will belong to me!

729.「私は 怪蟲アラグネ……。\n この大陸を 死と絶望で染めるために\n 暗黒大樹:
I am Araniad... I was born from the Dark
Tree to stain this land with death and
despair...

730.「私の 愛しい ニコロイ坊や。\n この母に会えて うれしかったかい？\n 家族:
My dear little Nikoroi...were you happy to see
your precious mother again? Did you really
think your family had returned?

731.「ふふふ……。お前の 病弱な母なら\n とっくの昔に この世を去ったよ。\n 殺:
Hee hee hee... Your sickly mother left this
world a long time ago.
It was ME who killed her.

732.「私は お前の母親になりすまして\n この城に入り込んだのさ。聖地の扉を開くため:
I entered this castle under the guise of your
mother, hoping to obtain the golden ring that
would open passage to the Sanctuary.

733.「だが あのリタだけは\n 私の正体に 気づいてしまった。:
But that Rita... She was the only one who saw
through my clever deception.

734.「たかが小娘ひとりの抵抗など 取るに足らぬと\n 放っておいたのが 私の あやま:
It was a mistake to underestimate that little
girl's power.

735.「自分の命と引き換えにして この私を\n ５０年もの間 この地に封じ込めたのさ！:
She gave up her life to keep me sealed in this
land for fifty years!!

736.「お前たちには 礼を言わねばなるまい。\n 私を 封印から解き放ち\n この聖地:
I must show you all my utmost gratitude. After
all, you did free my from my seal and led me
to this sacred land.

737.「さあ チカラのかぎり 泣き叫ぶがよい。\n お前たちの悲鳴は この大陸に産まれ:
I want you to cry out with all your might!
Your screams will be the birth of the darkness
and destruction of this land!

741.「今度は しっかり 頼むぜっ！！: I'm counting on you this time!!

743.「ふざけるな……。私は この時を……\n ５０年も待って……。:
This is unbelievable... I have waited...
Fifty years for this...

744.「なぜ…… お前が こんなチカラを……。: Why...do you possess such great power...?

745.「あの…… 白き者 リタですら………\n 封印が 精一杯 だった……\n の に:
Even... that Rita, a White One...
was only able to... seal me away...

747.「よくやってくれた……！\n そなたが いてくれなかったら\n どうなっていたか:
You've done it! I don't want to think what
would've happened if you weren't here...

748.「しかし まさか 母上が……。\n わしは何も知らずに\n 姉上に すべてを押し:
But I never imagined that Mother would...
I left everything to my sister without
knowing a thing...

752.「聖地を狙っていた 恐ろしい魔物は\n もう いないのですね。:
The horrible monster that was after the
Sanctuary is no longer here, it seems.

753.「ありがとうございました。\n これで この聖地のチカラを\n 解放することがで:
Thank you... Now I can finally unleash the
Sanctuary's power.

754.「聖地のチカラは ふたたび\n このエルトナ大陸中に届くでしょう。:
The Sanctuary's power will once again flow
throughout the land of Eltona.

755.「そこの お方…………。\n あなたに お願いがあります。:
You, there...
I have a favor to ask.

756.「私の…… 私の大切な弟に……\n 伝えてほしいことがあるのです。:
To...to my dearest brother....
I want you to tell him something.

757.「名を ニコロイといいます。\n まだ幼い…… たった６才の子供です。\n 今も:
His name is Nikoroi.
He's just a little boy...about six years old.
He may still be crying somewhere...

758.「あなたは強い子だから……\n たとえ ひとりになっても この国を守る\n 強い:
But he's a strong boy... Even if he's alone,
he will be a strong king who will protect
this country one day...

760.「わかりました。\n 伝えます……。必ず……！:
I understand. I'll... I'll be sure to tell
him!

761.「お父さま…… お母さま……\n リタも おそばへ参ります………。:
Father... Mother...
I will soon be reunited with you...

762.「ニコロイ…… あなたのことだけは……: Nikoroi... You're the only one left...

763.「守れ た…… よ ね………。: I'm glad I was...able to protect you...

768.「最後の最後まで 人のことばかり思いやって……: Always think of others, until the very end...

769.「あなたは こんな所で……\n たったひとりで 命と引き換えに\n 聖地を 守っ:
And here you are, in this place...
All alone, protecting this Sanctuary at
the cost of your own life!

770.「でも ニコロイ王……。\n 私たちは 最後に リタ姫様のことを\n お助けする:
But, King Nikoroi...
We were able to help Princess Rita in the
end, right?

771.「リタ姫様の魂は 自由になれました。\n だからこそ あんなにも\n 幸せそうな:
Her soul is finally free. That's why she
looked so happy.

773.「ふっ……。\n まったく お前には かなわんな。:
Hmph... You're quite something, you know
that?

774.「キュウスケ <cs_pchero>。\n お前たちには 何度 礼を言っても足り:
Kyusuke, <cs_pchero>...
Words cannot express how grateful I am.

775.「共に カミハルムイ城へ戻ろうではないか。\n そこで あらためて礼をしよう。\:
Let's return to the castle. I can thank you
more properly there. I'll be waiting.

776.「<pc>。よくぞ 戻ってくれた。: It's good to see you again, <pc>.

777.「コトル！ <pc>に あれを。:
Kotoru! Please give <pc> what
they've earned.

782.「わしは 姉上の遺志を継ぎ\n これからは 聖地の守り手としての役目を\n まっ:
I will carry on my sister's legacy, and take
her place as the guardian of the Sanctuary.

783.「<pc>。そなたのことは 忘れない。\n いずれ そなたが道に迷ったときには\:
I will never forget what you've done. If there
is ever a time where you lose your way, I
will do everything in my power to help.

786.「オレが 桜のキーエンブレムをもらえたのは\n <pc>が オレの代わりに\n:
I got the Sakura Key Emblem too, even though
you're the one who did all the heavy lifting!

787.「おおっと そんな冷たい目で見るなよ。: Come on, don't look at me like that.

788.「お前にゃ悪いが オレが命を張るのは\n 愛するユーチャーリンのためだけ。:
Sorry to break it to you, but I'm only willing
to risk my life for my beloved Ucharin.

789.「それ以外のヤツのために\n 命を張るわけには いかねえのさ！: I'm not gonna risk it for anyone else!

9230.「ハイッ！ お安いご用で。: Yes, sir! I'm at your service.

9231.「おそらく 王都カミハルムイには\n 何か 忌まわしい歴史があるということ……。:
Perhaps it means that Kamiharmui has some
kind of abominable history...

9232.「ニコロイ王は それを解き明かすために\n 捨てられた城へ 出向いていらっしゃる:
King Nikoroi went to the abandoned castle to
find out what happened.

9233.「しかし…… あの地は 不吉で恐ろしい土地だ。\n わしは 王の身が 心配でなら:
But... That place is ominous and terrible.
I fear for the king's life.

9234.「そなたは 王に 会いたいのだろう？\n ならば 捨てられた城まで\n ニコロイ:
You were looking to meet with the king, yes?
If so, then why not go to that abandoned
castle to check how he is doing?

9235.「先ほど行かせた キュウスケも\n かなりの手練れだが 彼ひとりでは\n 難儀す:
I just sent over that Kyusuke, who is quite
skilled...but he might have some trouble on
his own. It's best to prepare yourself.

9236.「捨てられた城は この都の北門を抜けた先\n 夢幻の森の 奥地にある。\n くわ:
The abandoned castle lies beyond the city's
northern gate, deep within the Dream Forest.
Ask around the castle if you need know more.

9239.「ご病気が よくなったんだね！: I'm so glad she's feeling better!

9241.「おや ニコロイ王子。\n おいしそうな 山ブドウじゃないですか。:
Oh, Nikoroi.
Those are some tasty looking grapes.

9242.「よく お聞きなさい……\n あ 暗黒大樹の葉を この城に……:
Please listen to me carefully...
You must bring a leaf from the Dark Tree
to this castle...

9244.「わしは あの地で 恐ろしい幻影を見た……。\n だが そのおかげで\n おぼろ:
I witnessed terrible visions in that place...
But because of that, I was given a vague
recollection of something.

9246.「だから あの城は 忌まわしい城とされたのだ。\n その日より 聖地のチカラが失:
That is why that castle came to be known as accursed. From that day forth. the Sanctuary's power was lost... Most likely due to the
madness of my sister.

9248.「あの城に遺された 亡き母上の遺志が\n わしに何かを伝えるため\n あのような:
Did my mother's lingering will show me such
a vision to try and convey a message to me?

9249.「……よし！ 確かなことは わからぬが\n 捨てられた城に 暗黒大樹の葉を納めよ:
All right! I will gather a leaf from the Dark Tree and bring it to the abandoned castle! My mother's words must've had some kind
of significance to them.

9250.「あ 暗黒大樹の葉ですと……？: D...did you say a leaf from the Dark Tree...?

9251.「オホン！！ エルトナ大陸 西端の\n 呪われた大地にそびえる 黒き大樹の葉です:
Ahem! You mean a leaf from that giant, dark
tree that rises from the Cursed Land, right?
I heard they're not so easy to come by...

9252.「大臣 おふれを出せ！\n もっとも早く 暗黒大樹の葉を\n 城に届けた者に ほ:
Issue this decree, Minister! The first person
to deliver a leaf from the Dark Tree to this
castle shall be rewarded!

9254.「ここは私と 後ろにいる\n <pc>に おまかせを！: <pc> and I will take care of it!

9255.「ニコロイ王！ 暗黒大樹の葉を\n 手に入れてまいりました！:
King Nikoroi! Here is the leaf of the
Dark Tree that you requested!

9256.「あの地が 悪しき者の手に落ちれば\n この大陸は 暗黒大樹に すべてをむしばま:
If that sacred place falls into the hands of
evil, this land will be consumed by the Dark
Tree and meet its demise.

9257.「ニコロイよ。あの日に 私が落とした\n 黄金の指輪を 持っていますか？:
Do you still have the golden ring I dropped
that day?

9258.「お前さんが <pc>じゃな？\n ニコロイ様と 捨てられた城で\n リタ姫様の:
You're <pc>, aren't you? I heard
that you and King Nikoroi found out about
Princess Rita at the abandoned castle.

9259.「じいさん！ 忌まわしい あの姫の名など\n クチにしては なりませぬ。\n 災:
You old coot! Don't speak the name of that
abominable princess... You'll bring us
all bad luck!

9261.「スズ……。\n リタ姫様は ほんに アタマがよく\n 優しい子じゃった。:
Suzu... Princess Rita was a very kind and
smart girl, you know.

9262.「会えばケンカばかりで 素直になれなかった\n わしらを 結びつけてくれたのは\:
It was Princess Rita who always brought us
together, despite all our fighting. Without
her, we never would've gotten close.

9263.「とっても お似合いなのに……と\n リタ姫様は無邪気な笑顔で おっしゃられた。:
She'd say "you look so good together" with an
innocent smile... That smile made us open
up to one another.

9264.「そんな 優しい姫様が 人が変わったように\n 凶行を起こしたから たたりだ 呪:
But when the gentle princess turned violent,
everyone feared it was fate, or a curse...and
abandoned the castle.

9265.「あの悲しい出来事は まだ若い兵士だった\n わしの目の前で 起きたのだ。\n:
I was just a young soldier when that tragedy
occurred. I can still see it clear as day.

9266.「アグシュナ様を 手にかけた後……\n 我に返った リタ姫様の \n たとえよう:
After the attack on Lady Agushuna... Princess
Rita came to her senses, and her face had a
look of indescribable sadness.

9267.「そして その後 王家の庭の泉のふちで\n そろえた状態で見つかった リタ姫様の:
Later, they found Princess Rita's shoes at the
edge of the fountain in the royal garden.

9268.「当時は すべてが 恐ろしく\n あの城から 遠く離れることしか\n 考えられな:
At the time, I was terrified, and all I could
think about was getting as far away from
that castle as I possibly could...

9269.「いちばん つらく苦しい思いをしたのは\n リタ姫様では なかったかと……\n:
I now believe that it was Princess Rita who
was suffering the most...

9279.「それが 白き者の さだめなのか……\n あの娘は ひとりで 私を追いだそうとし:
Was it her fate as the White One...? She tried
to cast me out all by herself. She didn't even
tell anyone that her mother had been killed.

9280.「あの娘……！ 私が アタマの弱い\n ナシュロイ王を殺して ようやく\n 黄金:
That blasted girl..! Just when I thought I'd
killed that weakling Nashuroi and gotten
my hands on that ring...!

9281.「だが もうよい！\n 私の望みは 今こそ かなう！\n エルトナ大陸の心臓は:
But no longer! My desires are now fulfilled!
The heart of Eltona is within my grasp!

9282.「よって お前たちには 名誉ある死を与えよう！:
As your just reward, I sentence you all to an
honorable death!

9283.<pc>は\n桜のキーエンブレム（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！<me 72>:
<pc> received
the Sakura Key Emblem (Key Item)!<me 72>

9284.「その 桜のキーエンブレムは\n そなたを 王都カミハルムイの\n 英雄であると:
That Sakura Key Emblem recognizes you as a
champion of this city of Kamiharmui.

9285.「<pc>。失われていた聖地のチカラが戻り\n この大陸に ふたたび平穏な日々が:
The power of the lost Sanctuary will return,
and this land will once again know peace.
All because of your efforts.

9287.「いやあ 会えてよかった。\n 都を発つ前に あんたに\n 礼を 言っときたかっ:
I'm glad I ran into you. I wanted to say
thanks before leaving the city.

28549.「私は かろうじて命を奪われなかったものの\n リタの あやつるチカラで\n こ:
I barely escaped with my life, but Rita's
power sealed me in this place for fifty years.

28550.「それを持てば この都にある\n 王都カミハルムイ駅も 自由に利用できる。:
With it, you'll have free access to the
city's train station.

29814.「あの指輪は 王家の庭にある\n 聖地への扉を開く カギなのです。:
That ring is the key to opening the way to
the Sanctuary in the royal garden.

29815.「王家の庭は この城の裏手にある庭なのだが\n 今では 土砂に 道をふさがれてい:
The royal garden is the one behind the castle.
But it's been blocked by rubble, so we'll have
to go around to get there.
